alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Dawson; Douglas; Forsyth; Hall; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 5:27AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm producing heavy rainfall will impact portions of southeastern Paulding, DeKalb, Forsyth, Cobb, northeastern Douglas, Gwinnett, southeastern Dawson, southwestern Hall, Fulton and northern Clayton Counties through 630 AM EST... At 524 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Auraria, or near Dawsonville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain expected to cause ponding on roadways or temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Drive slow and give yourself ample time to reach your destination. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Gainesville, Douglasville, Lawrenceville, Decatur, Cumming, Peachtree Corners, City of South Fulton, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Johns Creek, Alpharetta, Smyrna, Dunwoody, East Point, Milton, Duluth, Union City and Sugar Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for north central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Cobb; Dawson; Douglas; Forsyth; Hall; Paulding
